In order to present this project:
	1. Download all files in repository, file names and structure are in README.md
	2. Unzip file
	3. Find file named: "index.html" under folder "src"
	4. Double Click or Right click and open in Google Chrome

// If an object glows and tilts towards your cursor, it is a button.
// PLEASE DO NOT EDIT ANY FILES WITHOUT CODING EXPERIENCE.
